summary: WHILE DRIVING POWER STEERING JUST GAVE OUT AND CAUSED ME TO LOSE CONTROL OVER THE VEHICLE.  LUCKILY NO ACCIDENT OCCURED, BUT THERE WAS NO WARNING OR MESSAGE FROM THE VEHICLE JUST LOSS OF CONTROL.  LOOKED UP PROBLEMS RELATED TO THIS ISSUE AND FOUND RECALL 14S06.  HOWEVER, MY VEHICLE WAS NOT COVERED UNDER THE RECALL EVEN THOUGH THE SYMPTOMS ARE THE SAME AS DESCRIBED BY THE RECALL.
